column4: hi, 10.04 alpha 4 booted and recognized automatically my 24" 1920x1080 monitor. The 10.04 released does not (1280x960), and xrandr does not show the 1*920x1080 resolution as aviailable. Did they introduced a regression? Any tips/fix?
I've suggested a school to buy 16 of those monitors...
